pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linphone is a free open source SIP client for HD voice/video calls, conference calling, and instant messaging. It features end-to-end encrypted communications, a modern user interface, and supports advanced functionalities like screen sharing, file transfer, and group chat. Linphone is cross-platform and available for desktop environments (GNU/Linux, macOS, Windows) and mobile devices (iOS, Android). It's built on the Liblinphone SDK, which can be embedded into other applications requiring real-time communication.

Linphone 是一个免费开源的 SIP 客户端，用于高清语音/视频通话、会议通话和 即时消息。它具有端到端加密通信功能，现代用户界面，并支持高级功能，如 屏幕共享、文件传输和群组聊天。Linphone 是跨平台的，可用于桌面环境 （GNU/Linux, macOS, Windows）和移动设备（iOS, Android）。它基于 Liblinphone SDK 构建，该 SDK 可嵌入到其他需要实时通信的应用程序中。
